Description: Wild Bill Hickok Pocket Watch This beautiful pocket watch is a tribute to the Wild Bill Hickok and our beautiful Southwest. The inside picture is of Wild Bill Hickok. It is new and comes complete with a gold colored chain and clasp It has never been used. It runs by battery and comes in a presentation box. The watch is approximately two inches across. It is a perfect piece to give or to keep especially for person who collects western items. I have included shipping to anywhere in the United States so you know exactly what you are paying. Please check our out ebay store to see the wide selection of southwestern items which we carry.
